description.en:
Boost your contracts by making more money, and allowing collection of the spoils! - 50% more profit from every contract - 10 max contracts - 5 max contracts per type - 50 total contracts available - Borrowed contract equipment comes with free fieldwork items to fill your tools - Allow using swathing equipment on harvest missions - Allow collecting straw from harvest missionss - Allow collecting grass from mowing missions - Allow collecting stones from plow, cultivate, and sowing missions
All of the above settings can be modified via an XML settings file at FarmingSimulator2025/modSettings/ContractBoost.xml
For license & feedback, please visit: https://github.com/GMNGjoy/FS25_ContractBoost
